title: Snoooz uses AI to smarten up your email box – and it’s only $39.99
content:
Macworld

Creating the right work-life balance is hard enough during a normal work week. But how annoying is it to try relaxing on a vacation day when you’re constantly lit up with work emails from people who don’t know (or don’t care) that you’re off the clock?

Since setting an OOO message doesn’t always do the trick, Snoooz is an AI-driven out-of-office management solution that streamlines the whole messy process.

Snoooz crafts an infinite array of tailored autoresponder templates that engage and retain customers just the way you want, whether they’re just discovering you or if they’re already a loyal customer. Thanks to its intelligent programming using dynamic tags, each response feels genuinely personalized, incorporating sender names, out-of-office (OOO) dates, alternative contact information, and CRM insights to build a connection that feels anything but robotic and impersonal. It can reschedule meetings, tag responses for easier follow-ups, assign backups, or fashion customized coverage plans.

This lifetime subscription to Snoooz AI Starter is available only to new users — now on sale for over 70% off at just $39.99.
